security: Revealing that the CIA is gathering information on individuals like [Giulio Mondello] and [Neriolo] could compromise intelligence-gathering operations and potentially damage relationships with individuals or entities in Italy and Cuba.
summary: A secret cable from the Director to Mexico, Rome, and WAVE providing information on individuals [Giulio Mondello] and [Neriolo], including [Mondello]'s former role as an agent in Cuba for [FIAT] and owner of a TV tube factory, and [Neriolo]'s connection to the (LINOTYPE) firm in Turin.
summary_one_paragraph: This secret cable, dated September 30, 1963, is addressed from the Director to Mexico, Rome, and WAVE, relaying information regarding individuals [Giulio Mondello] and [Neriolo]. It identifies [Giulio Mondello] as born on February 26, 1917, an Italian citizen, and formerly an agent in Cuba for [FIAT] and the owner of a TV tube factory. It also identifies [Neriolo] as connected to a (LINOTYPE) firm in Turin. The cable requests that this information be perused, referencing previous directives 72347 and 72346.
title: Information on [Giulio Mondello] and [Neriolo]
